memberdef.argsstring: (const t_commrec *cr, std::vector< gmx::RVec, AllocatorType > *v, int numAtoms)
memberdef.name: bcastPaddedRVecVector

briefdescription.para: Broadcasts the, non-dynamic, state from the master to all ranks in cr->mpi_comm_mygroup.
Broadcasts ir and mtop from the master to all nodes in cr->mpi_comm_mygroup.
Broadcast inputrec and mtop and allocate node-specific settings.
